__e: If you ain't scared of what needs to be done, then you ain't got no clue why you're here.

Well, I know you're finishing your Global Health paper today and you've been working really hard on it.
All right, perhaps this task will be a little bit more up your alley.
Then why did you come down here to ask me what the assignment is?
-That might be too big a job for you.
Well, as long as he's out there on the loose, he's my problem.
I finished my paper and I don't have anything to do.
And I'm your mother, and it's my job to keep you safe.
I know how it looks, but our task then was to make sure the PM wasn't tarnished.

But our jobs remain the same. They fall down, we help them up.
